name: Strawberry Waffle
description: By pouring strawberry sauce on the dragon-scale waffle, This food gives you the defense of giant dragon. Within 3 minutes, All damage reduces by 20%. This effect cannot stack up with other dragon-scale waffles, and is not influenced by death. This item can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Strength Ring
description: A magic ring that enhances the power of users.

name: Strength Ring [1]
description: A magic ring that enhances the power of users.

name: Strong Sake
description: The bamboo-brewed sake made by the tavern boss in Payon, a strong wine purified in a special way. Drinking it increases Atk by 15%. The effect lasts 15 minutes, Cannot stack up with other sake, and is not influenced by death. This item can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Strong Shield
description: A shield fortified by magic, has an outstanding M.Def ability.

name: Strong Shield [1]
description: A shield fortified by magic, has an outstanding M.Def ability.

name: Stunner
description: A mace that can cause death to the target after being hit.

name: Succubus Horn
description: Succubus horn that looks like girls. Looking at the upward horn, You will an unknown power.

name: Succubus Horn Blueprint
description: Succubus horn that looks like girls. Looking at the upward horn, You will an unknown power.

name: Succubus Horn [1]
description: Succubus horn that looks like girls. Looking at the upward horn, You will an unknown power.

name: Summer baseball cap·Green
chineseName: 夏日扶桑棒球帽·椰子绿
description: Rebel Bandana with handsome backward green baseball cap, looks surprisingly matching. Wear this to the beach and get a nice looking tan.

description: Rebel Bandana with handsome backward Blue baseball cap, looks surprisingly matching. Wear this to the beach and get a nice looking tan.
